edge: The film's musical score was composed by Mychael Danna
composed the music to Lee's films The Ice Storm and Ride with the Devil. A soundtrack album of the music was released by Sony Classical Records on 16 November 2012.
The song 'Pi's Lullaby' was co-written by Danna and Bombay Jayashri, who performs the song in Tamil.
The soundtrack album features the track 'Pi's Lullaby'
